concept.title: Sub-Classifications
concept.shortdesc: Marketing reports support both single-level and multiple-level classifications models. A classification hierarchy allows you to apply a classification to a classification.

p.note: Sub-classification refers to the ability to create classifications of classifications. However, this is not the same as a Classification Hierarchy used to create Hierarchy reports. For more information about Classification hierarchies, see Classification Hierarchies in the Administration Help.

draft-comment.p: Removed sub-classifications in rule builder. Preserve subclass files in project for future reference.
